neutral_subtle.description: use for captions, legends and alike

danger.description: use on form captions, fieldset.legend, label

active.description: Use for active text which can toggle. > Tab.Label

neutral_subtle.description: use for secondary elements on inputs as placeholder, inputIcon. Also prefix and sufix while input is empty.
Use for secondary texts or icons. > Menu.MenuItem.Desicription Menu.MenuItem.Icon

inverted.description: Use for content on bold colors, where neutral wouldn't have enough contrast. > on bold.warning

inverted_subtle.description: use for secondary elements on inputs as placeholder, inputIcon. Also prefix and sufix while input is empty.

informative.description: Use for components which can be used anywhere e.g: Loader

informative_subtle.description: Use for components which can be used anywhere e.g: Loader

informative_inverted_subtle.description: Use for components which can be used anywhere e.g: Loader

informative_inverted.description: Use for components which can be used anywhere e.g: Loader

subtle.description: Only for internal purposes e.g. slot component

Rest.description: Apply on prefix- or suffix-texts of an input which is already populated with content.  e.g: Numberfield
